#ChIP-seq-batch: ## This file is a working example of valid batch format
## Basic format requires header line starting with '#ChIP-seq-batch'
## As a minimum each sample requires: ChIP_file; factor; antibody and cell specified.
## Comments or samples to be ignored must begin with a double '##'
## Multiple files are accepted as a space ' ' separated list.
## Multiple files may also be specified as a bash file 'glob' using asterisks*
## Paired-end data is optional i.e. chip_file2
